ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] new to group
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey a spy!  My two oldest sons play on Karana.  I would like reports on them!  Briyn, 65 druid and Dreadtouch 56 necro. If they act like idiot teenage boys,
ygData.messageBody:
Hey a spy! My two oldest sons play on Karana. I would like reports on
them! Briyn, 65 druid and Dreadtouch 56 necro.

If they act like idiot teenage boys, it's because they are.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 11/13/03 at ginette slater wrote:

____>Hi all, I play Sierrasunset, a 52 human paladin
____>(rodcet Nife deity) and also Laeari, a 32 high elf
____>enchantress (Tunare deity), both on the Karana Server.
____>They are both guilded with Outriders of Karana. Feel
____>free to send a tell in game if you need anything or
____>just to say hi. I look forward to chatting with you all


----------------------------
Dr. Mom, mother of the Alphabet soup boys:

Bryn Bailey October 17, 1984-ADHD, gifted, ODD, LD
Aubrey Bailey April 12, 1986 -ADD, gifted, LD
Devin Bailey April 10, 1988 -ADD, talented, LD
Curran Bailey January 30, 1990-ADD, brain damaged, OCD, seizures
Erin Bailey May 6, 1993 -ADHD, OCD, gifted

And Alphabet Mom, ADHD, gifted, ODD and LD too!
